您觉得未来桂支在“新的势力”和“摔惨的受益者”这二者之间更有可能成为哪一个？

It depends on whether Europe can successfully fight against the virus on their own; if not, the China solution would get more and more attraction, and CCP is always ready to buy friends at the cost of Chinese people

Something can be smelled from the recent offer to Italy by CCP, as the aid request from Italy has been ignored by EU:
https://www.theguardian.com/world/2020/mar/11/italy-criticises-eu-being-slow-help-coronavirus-epidemic
https://www.scmp.com/news/china/diplomacy/article/3074682/china-sends-team-medical-experts-gear-help-italy-fight
Massari wrote on Politico’s website: “Today, this means Italy; tomorrow, the need could be elsewhere. Italy has already asked to activate the European Union mechanism of civil protection for the supply of medical equipment for individual protection. But unfortunately not a single EU country responded to the commission’s call. Only China responded bilaterally. Certainly this is not a good sign of European solidarity.”
